title: Files automatically delete themselves after stopping the download.
body:
Right, so I've downloaded the installer, installed the launcher, it updated to the new one.
The problem is after downloading 20% or so the launcher stops responding (after being idle at least).
I look at the League of Legends folder and it says 3.43 Gb or something (size).
Right so i start up the launcher again, it scans and the download starts again from 0.
I look at  at the LoL folder again and now it's 1.45 Gb.
Any help, like can i do it manually or smth, it requires 14Gb of space so like idk.

replies.body: So, my fully patched and working League installation right at this moment has a file size of 9.15Gb. If the patching process keeps cutting out around 20% it might be due to a lack of admin rights. Check out this guide on [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure League is able to scan and patch it's own game files.
